alert.note: Alert for Kiowa County Including Eads (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 01 at 11:02AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ..A Red Flag Warning has been issued for 5 am through 5 pm Friday... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 234... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 5 AM to 5 PM MST Friday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 234. * Winds...West 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 18 percent. * Impacts...Travel will be dangerous due to high winds. Conditions will be extremely favorable for the rapid spread and intensification of any fires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
